thread.title: Carl Edwards to Guest Star in New Comedy “The Grinder”
thread.title_full: Carl Edwards to Guest Star in New Comedy “The Grinder”

author: Carmen Cox
title: Carl Edwards to Guest Star in New Comedy “The Grinder”
text:
Share Article 
Jeff Zelevansky/Getty Images (NEW YORK) — Carl Edwards has scored a role in the new Fox comedy The Grinder , starring Rob Lowe and Fred Savage.In The Grinde r, which premiered Tuesday night, Lowe plays an actor who starred on a legal drama titled "The Grinder." When his show ends, he moves back to his hometown of Boise, Idaho, and teams up with his brother — Savage's character — at the family law firm.Edwards will make a cameo in a November episode as a police deputy who pulls over the two brothers, according to The Hollywood Reporter .Edwards ranks third in the Chase standings after two races in NASCAR's playoffs.Copyright   Wednesday, September 30, 2015 at 5:54AM
